name: Friend Ship (itch)
description:
What has three friends stranded on it? The island that you and your friends are stranded on! Work together with one of your friends as you attempt to make a tropical getaway. Don't worry if you don't know how to build a ship from scratch, because you've landed on ~Convenience Island~, which has everything you'll need just laying around.

You might have to find your third wheel before he starves out in the middle of the woods, though...

Made by four students for a four-week game jam, with the theme of "Friendship".

Please laugh at the hilarious pun we made.
